user.title: Setup the NSW Fuel API Integration
user.description: Visit api.nsw.gov.au, subscribe to the FuelCheck API (free) and create an app (any name) to obtain your API Key and Secret.

data_description.longitude:
Either accept these coordinates from your Home zone or enter a location above to find nearby stations. You can find latitude and longitude using services such as Google Maps or latlong.net.

{attribution}

station_select.title: Select Stations
station_select.description: These are the stations close to the coordinates you entered. Select the stations you wish to create a fuel price sensor for. You can return to this form and use different coordinates for additional fuel stations.

error.auth: NSW Fuel API Key or API Secret is wrong.
error.connection: Error connecting to the server. Check logs.
error.invalid_coordinates: The latitude or longitude is invalid or outside NSW/TAS.
